structure.unit: ARTICLE XVII. ADDITIONAL REDUCTION IN ASSESSED VALUE FOR QUALIFYING LIVING QUARTERS OF PARENTS OR GRANDPARENTS OF OWNERS OF PROPERTY RECEIVING HOMESTEAD EXEMPTION

text.section:
Sec. 29-128. [Failure to file.]
Failure to file the application and required supporting documentation by March 1st in any given year shall constitute a waiver of the reduction in assessment for that year.
